levelName: 英文單字認讀基礎級(三)

examples.english: She colored her hair red yesterday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 她昨天下午把頭髮染成紅色。

examples.english: He combed his hair quickly before school.
examples.chinese: 他上學前很快地梳了梳頭髮。

examples.english: There was a hair on my shirt this morning.
examples.chinese: 今天早上我的襯衫上有一根頭髮。

results.error: API Error: No image data in response

examples.english: My mom held my hand as we walked home.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽牽著我的手走回家。

examples.english: The boy raised his hand to answer the question.
examples.chinese: 那個男生舉手回答問題。

examples.english: He handed his friend a small red ball.
examples.chinese: 他遞給他的朋友一顆小的紅色球。

examples.english: I hurt my leg when I fell down.
examples.chinese: 我跌倒的時候弄傷了我的腿。

examples.english: The table in my room has four strong legs.
examples.chinese: 我房間裡的桌子有四條堅固的桌腳。

examples.english: My little brother ran very fast with his short legs.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟用他短短的腿跑得很快。

examples.english: My friend has a very cute cat.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友有一隻很可愛的貓。

examples.english: Yesterday, my cat played with a small toy.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我的貓玩了一個小玩具。

examples.english: My cat always sleeps on the sofa.
examples.chinese: 我的貓總是在沙發上睡覺。

examples.english: We had a lovely dog when I was little.
examples.chinese: 我小時候養了一隻可愛的狗。

examples.english: The neighborhood dog barked at the cat last night.
examples.chinese: 鄰居的狗昨晚對貓叫了。

examples.english: I saw a big brown dog playing in the park.
examples.chinese: 我在公園裡看到一隻棕色的大狗在玩。

examples.english: The little bird flew high in the sky yesterday.
examples.chinese: 這隻小鳥昨天在天空飛得很高。

examples.english: I heard a beautiful bird sing a sweet song this morning.
examples.chinese: 我今天早上聽到一隻美麗的鳥唱著甜美的歌。

examples.english: A mother bird built a small nest in the big tree.
examples.chinese: 一隻鳥媽媽在大樹上築了一個小鳥巢。

examples.english: The bear ate a lot of honey yesterday.
examples.chinese: 那隻熊昨天吃了很多蜂蜜。

examples.english: Bears like to sleep in the cold winter.
examples.chinese: 熊喜歡在寒冷的冬天睡覺。

examples.english: That big bear has soft brown fur and a short tail.
examples.chinese: 那隻大熊有柔軟的棕色毛皮和一條短尾巴。

examples.english: I saw a yellow duck swimming in the pond yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天看到一隻黃色的鴨子在池塘裡游泳。

examples.english: The boy quickly ducked to avoid the thrown ball.
examples.chinese: 男孩快速地彎下身子，以閃躲丟過來的球。

examples.english: My family ate tasty duck for dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 我家人昨晚晚餐吃了美味的鴨肉。

examples.english: My grandma's chicken laid a big egg yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶的雞昨天下了一顆大蛋。

examples.english: I ate some delicious fried chicken for dinner.
examples.chinese: 我晚餐吃了一些美味的炸雞。

examples.english: We saw a big white chicken on the farm.
examples.chinese: 我們在農場看到了一隻又大又白的雞。

examples.english: The small mouse ran quickly across the kitchen floor.
examples.chinese: 小老鼠快速地跑過了廚房地板。

examples.english: I used the computer mouse to click on the fun game icon.
examples.chinese: 我用電腦滑鼠點擊了那個有趣的遊戲圖示。

examples.english: My cat chased a tiny mouse hiding under the old sofa.
examples.chinese: 我的貓追趕一隻躲在舊沙發下的小老鼠。

examples.english: I saw a big pink pig on the farm.
examples.chinese: 我在農場看到一隻大大的粉紅色豬。

examples.english: He ate his food like a pig at the party.
examples.chinese: 他在派對上吃東西像一頭豬一樣。

examples.english: My little brother has a cute piggy bank.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟有一個可愛的撲滿。

examples.english: My friend had a white rabbit as a pet last year.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友去年養了一隻白色的兔子當寵物。

examples.english: Yesterday, a brown rabbit hopped quickly into the bushes.
examples.chinese: 昨天，一隻棕色的兔子快速跳進了灌木叢。

examples.english: My sister loved the cute rabbit in the storybook.
examples.chinese: 我妹妹很喜歡故事書裡那隻可愛的兔子。

examples.english: A fox ran into the forest quickly.
examples.chinese: 一隻狐狸快速地跑進森林裡。

examples.english: The little fox was very smart and found food.
examples.chinese: 那隻小狐狸很聰明，找到了食物。

examples.english: We read a story about a talking fox.
examples.chinese: 我們讀了一個關於會說話的狐狸的故事。

examples.english: We saw a big lion at the zoo yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天在動物園看到一隻大獅子。

examples.english: A male lion has a thick mane on its head.
examples.chinese: 公獅子的頭上有一圈濃密的鬃毛。

examples.english: The hungry lion let out a very loud roar.
examples.chinese: 那隻飢餓的獅子發出非常響亮的吼叫聲。

examples.english: I saw a big tiger with black stripes at the zoo yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天在動物園看到一隻有黑色條紋的大老虎。

examples.english: The big tiger roared loudly in the jungle.
examples.chinese: 那隻大老虎在叢林裡大聲地吼叫。

examples.english: My favorite stuffed animal is a soft, orange tiger.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的填充玩偶是一隻柔軟的橘色老虎。

examples.english: I saw a white sheep on the farm yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天在農場看到一隻白色的羊。

examples.english: My mom bought a soft wool sweater made from sheep.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽買了一件用羊毛做的柔軟毛衣。

examples.english: Last night, I counted many sheep to fall asleep.
examples.chinese: 昨晚，我數了好多隻羊才睡著。

examples.english: We saw a playful monkey at the zoo yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天在動物園看到一隻頑皮的猴子。

examples.english: The clever monkey ate all the bananas quickly.
examples.chinese: 那隻聰明的猴子很快地吃光了所有的香蕉。

examples.english: My little brother acted like a monkey yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟昨天表現得像個猴子一樣。

examples.english: We saw a big elephant at the zoo yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天在動物園看到一隻大象。

examples.english: The baby elephant played with its long trunk.
examples.chinese: 小象用牠的長鼻子玩耍。

examples.english: My mom bought me an elephant toy last week.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽上週買給我一個大象玩具。

examples.english: The big horse ate green grass in the field.
examples.chinese: 大馬在田裡吃綠色的草。

examples.english: Yesterday, I rode a gentle horse at the farm.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我在農場騎了一匹溫馴的馬。

examples.english: My little sister played with her new rocking horse.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹玩她的新搖搖馬。

examples.english: Yesterday, I saw a big green frog by the pond.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我在池塘邊看到一隻大青蛙。

examples.english: The small frog jumped into the water very fast.
examples.chinese: 那隻小青蛙很快地跳進水裡。

examples.english: My brother found a tiny frog in the garden yesterday.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我哥哥在花園裡找到了一隻小青蛙。

examples.english: Yesterday, I saw a tiny ant walking on the ground.
examples.chinese: 昨天，我看見一隻小螞蟻在地上走。

examples.english: The ant quickly carried a piece of bread to its hole.
examples.chinese: 那隻螞蟻很快地把一塊麵包搬到牠的洞裡。

examples.english: We saw many ants marching in a long line on the wall.
examples.chinese: 我們看到許多螞蟻在牆上排成一長列前進。

examples.english: A bee often sits on a bright flower.
examples.chinese: 蜜蜂常常坐在明亮的花朵上。

examples.english: A bee makes delicious honey for us to eat.
examples.chinese: 蜜蜂為我們製作美味的蜂蜜來吃。

examples.english: I saw a small bee fly away yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天看到一隻小蜜蜂飛走了。

examples.english: We saw a long snake in the zoo last week.
examples.chinese: 我們上週在動物園看到一條長長的蛇。

examples.english: The little snake hid under a rock.
examples.chinese: 小蛇藏在一顆石頭下面。

examples.english: My mom was born in the Year of the Snake.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽屬蛇。

examples.english: My friend has a lovely pet dog at home.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友家裡有一隻可愛的寵物狗。

examples.english: Many kids enjoy playing with their little pets.
examples.chinese: 很多小孩喜歡跟他們的小寵物玩。

examples.english: Our pet cat loves to sleep on the soft sofa.
examples.chinese: 我們家的寵物貓喜歡睡在軟軟的沙發上。

examples.english: We saw many cute animals at the zoo yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天在動物園看到很多可愛的動物。

examples.english: The little animal ran very fast in the park.
examples.chinese: 那隻小動物在公園跑得很快。

examples.english: My brother drew a big animal on the paper.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥在紙上畫了一隻大動物。

examples.english: This is my new book. I read it yesterday.
examples.chinese: 這是我的新書。我昨天讀了它。

examples.english: My friend and I played in the park last week.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友和我在上週去了公園玩。

examples.english: My dog ate its food quickly this morning.
examples.chinese: 我的狗今天早上很快地吃了牠的食物。

examples.english: Was that your favorite toy yesterday?
examples.chinese: 那是你昨天最喜歡的玩具嗎？

examples.english: You finished your homework before dinner.
examples.chinese: 你在晚餐前完成了你的功課。

examples.english: Your teacher said hello to me this morning.
examples.chinese: 你的老師今天早上跟我打招呼。

examples.english: He lost his blue pencil at school yesterday.
examples.chinese: 他昨天在學校弄丟了他的藍色鉛筆。

examples.english: David played with his best friend at the park.
examples.chinese: 大衛在公園和他的好朋友一起玩。

examples.english: Tom likes his new red hat very much.
examples.chinese: 湯姆很喜歡他的新紅色帽子。

examples.english: She brushed her teeth before bed last night.
examples.chinese: 她昨晚睡前刷了她的牙齒。

examples.english: We saw her at the store yesterday afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天下午在商店看到了她。

examples.english: My mom gave her a small gift today.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽今天給了她一個小禮物。

examples.english: The dog wagged its tail happily.
examples.chinese: 狗狗開心地搖著牠的尾巴。

examples.english: The tree lost its leaves in the autumn.
examples.chinese: 那棵樹在秋天掉光了牠的葉子。

examples.english: The elephant used its long trunk to drink water.
examples.chinese: 那隻大象用牠的長鼻子喝水。

examples.english: We ate our delicious lunch in the school cafeteria. (10 words)
examples.chinese: 我們在學校餐廳吃了我們美味的午餐。

examples.english: Our teacher gave us a fun storybook last week. (10 words)
examples.chinese: 我們的老師上週給了我們一本有趣的圖畫書。

examples.english: Yesterday, we cleaned our big house together. (8 words)
examples.chinese: 昨天，我們一起打掃了我們的大房子。

examples.english: The children played with their toys in the park.
examples.chinese: 孩子們在公園裡玩他們的玩具。

examples.english: The students opened their books and started to read.
examples.chinese: 學生們打開他們的書並開始閱讀。

examples.english: My friends shared their snacks with me yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友們昨天跟我分享他們的點心。

examples.english: Yes, I want to play with my friends.
examples.chinese: 對，我想要和我的朋友一起玩。

examples.english: Yes, you can borrow my book for class.
examples.chinese: 是的，你可以借我的書上課用。

examples.english: Yes, I went to the zoo with my family last week.
examples.chinese: 是的，我上週和我的家人去動物園了。

examples.english: No, thank you. I am full now.
examples.chinese: 不用了，謝謝。我現在飽了。

examples.english: We have no juice left for breakfast.
examples.chinese: 我們早餐沒有果汁了。

examples.english: The teacher said no talking during the test.
examples.chinese: 老師說考試時不可以說話。

examples.english: It is not cold outside today.
examples.chinese: 今天外面不冷。

examples.english: He did not finish his homework last night.
examples.chinese: 他昨晚沒有寫完功課。

examples.english: The cat was not hungry after eating its food.
examples.chinese: 貓咪吃完食物後不餓。

examples.english: O.K., you can play with your friends after homework.
examples.chinese: 好的，你寫完功課後可以和朋友玩。

examples.english: Is it O.K. to share your toys with me?
examples.chinese: 和我分享你的玩具好嗎？

examples.english: Don't worry, everything will be O.K. soon.
examples.chinese: 別擔心，所有事情很快就會好的。

examples.english: I saw a doctor because I felt unwell.
examples.chinese: 我去看醫生，因為我身體不舒服。

examples.english: A kind doctor gave me some medicine.
examples.chinese: 一位好心的醫生給了我一些藥。

examples.english: My mom wanted to be a doctor when she was young.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽年輕的時候想當醫生。

examples.english: My aunt is a kind nurse at the local hospital.
examples.chinese: 我的阿姨是當地醫院一位好心的護士。

examples.english: The girl nursed her sick puppy back to health.
examples.chinese: 那個女孩照顧她生病的小狗，直到牠康復。

examples.english: He nursed his injured leg after the soccer game.
examples.chinese: 足球賽後，他仔細護理他受傷的腿。

examples.english: She was a good singer when she was young.
examples.chinese: 她年輕的時候是個很棒的歌手。

examples.english: The famous singer sang many songs last night.
examples.chinese: 那位有名的歌手昨晚唱了好多歌。

examples.english: I saw a new singer at the concert yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天在演唱會看到一位新歌手。

examples.english: The actor played a brave hero in the new movie.
examples.chinese: 這位演員在新電影裡扮演了一個勇敢的英雄。

examples.english: My favorite actor won an award last night.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的演員昨晚贏得了一個獎。

examples.english: She wanted to be an actor when she grew up.
examples.chinese: 她長大後想成為一名演員。
